amendment.description: To require the posting of certain reports of the Department of Defense on the Internet website of the Department of Defense.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4784 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Defense of germaneness withdrawn in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Point of order withdrawn in Senate with respect to amendment SA 4784.
Defense of germaneness raised in Senate.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 4784.

Amendment SA 4784 proposed by Senator Coburn. (consideration: CR S8676-8677, S8678; text: CR S8676) To require the posting of certain reports of the Department of Defense on the Internet website of the Department of Defense.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4784 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4784 proposed by Senator Coburn.
